Some stuff I do

Bio

Hey! I'm Maxyto (well that's my name I go by online), I am currently 15, I am a keen programmer, web developer and hacker. I have always loved technology ever since I was young. I find coding very fun and challenging, I have been coding since I was 7 but I only started to take it more seriously since I was about 12. I have been learning ethical hacking since I was 14, I find this quite hard aswell but also enjoyable! I am always looking for ways to get better with technology, I have achieved a lot and have received certificates in the past. Not gonna show them on here but what you can see are some of my projects in the My Work section.

Web Developer

HTML was one of the first languages I learned (dont really want to refer to it as a programming language). It is used to create websites, including this one! Along with HTML, I used SASS and JavaScript. SASS is basically CSS with some extensions and JavaScript I used for some random stuff like the menu. Think of it like a human body, HTML is the actual body, CSS (or SASS in my case) is the clothing and JavaScript is the human functioning. I have also created a few sites in the past and have competed in competitions and earned certificates.

Programmer

I have done a lot of programming in the past. I am currently trying to focus on Python just because of the many things it is capable of. I have learned Python, Java and Javascript. I have touched a bit of SQL, C++, C, PHP and Lua. In the future I am planning to get better at C++, improve my Javascript frontend skills as I mostly do Javscript backend and get better at PHP. I do want to try to learn more languages than this but these are just some I want to focus on for now. Some of my programming projects can be found in the My Work section.

Hacker

Hacking is the most recent hobby I have started and I love it. I actually like this so much that I am considering having a job to do with cybersecurity when I'm older, probably a Penetration Tester. Some of you reading this might think hacking is illegal however this is not always the case. The type of hacking I want to do is hacking with permission, this is done in order to find vulnerabilities for something like a companies systems for example, this job has very good pay, this is not the only job in cybersecurity but is the one I want to do.
